name: Tandoori Masala Fried Fish Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Tandoori Masala Fried Fish Recipe: Boneless Fish (fingers) ½ kg Ginger Garlic Water 4 tbsp Tandoori Masala 2 tbsp Gram Flour ½ cup Cumin Seeds Powder 1 tsp Soda ¼ tsp Bread Crumbs ½ cup Oil for frying Salt as required Red Chilli Powder 1 tsp Chaat Masala2 tsp
instructions: In a fish add all the given ingredients except oil and leave it for 2 to 3 hours. Now heat oil add marinated fish and fry.
